title: What are the features of philosophical problems? - Quora

response.answer_text: They tend to either be metaphysical, ethical, or logical, and pose a challenge for thinking, acting, or understanding the world or philosophy. Other than that, I predict that not much can be said generally over the whole collection.
they can be answered. they don’t have any relationship to anything at all, so a philosophy problem is actually the problem of how some any opinion can be held to be true and forever real.
